task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I see that you're a public user (not yet an employee in the system). Based on the rules, public users do not have access to internal documentation including wiki articles about internal procedures like time tracking.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini Coatings! I'm glad to hear you'll be joining us soon.

However, the time tracking documentation and procedures are part of our internal employee resources and are only accessible once you've officially joined and have your employee credentials.

Once you start, you'll have access to our internal wiki where you can find detailed information about time tracking policies and procedures. Your onboarding process will also cover these topics.

If you have any general questions about the company before you start, I'm happy to help with publicly available information about Bellini Coatings, such as our locations, history, and general business areas.
